channel.title: Yell when a player receives a 99
channel.description:
How do I make it so the server yells to everyone when a player receives a 99 skill or gets maxed?
(I'm using Delta as base)

item.title: Yell when a player receives a 99
item.dc:creator: @RSMASTER RSMASTER
item.description:
@RSMASTER wrote:

Does your source have a yell command? If so you could take the yell method and place it under the congratulations on 99 message. Haven’t used delta in years so not a clue which file it’s in, sorry.

Read full topic
item.source: Yell when a player receives a 99
